DOC.brief_title: Associations Alveolar Bone Loss Interleukin-1β Levels One Two Stage Surgical Procedures
DOC.detailed_description: The present study include 40 healthy patient ( 24 male 16 female ; mean age , 30.75 ± 8.58 year ) one tooth absent mandible , Department Periodontology , Dicle University , Diyarbakir , Turkey , 2010 2011 . All patient inform detail study protocol , ask sign inform consent form . Ethics committee approval obtain Dicle University Ethics Committee study ( D.Ü.D.F.E.K.2010/02 ) This study design prospective , randomize , control study . Randomization perform prior surgery open sequentially number seal envelope correspond patient recruitment number . Investigators receive randomization instruction enrol subject immediately prior surgery . The participant randomly divide two group . A one-stage surgical procedure perform 20 patient ( Group I ) two-stage surgical procedure perform 20 patient ( Group II ) . The primary outcome study change alveolar bone level implant site T0 T2 month surgery measure CBCT . The secondary outcome T0 , T1 , T2 change level IL-1β PICF , probe pocket depth ( PPD ) , modify plaque index ( mPI ) , modify gingival index ( mGI ) , modify bleed index ( mBI ) . All implant ( Straumann AG , Waldenburg , Switzerland ) insert periodontist ( T.T.Y . ) present study . Pre-surgical radiographic evaluation conduct use CBCT . Before surgery , patient 's mouth rinse chlorhexidine mouthwash . After local anesthesia , full thickness flap reflect , osteotomy prepare first mandibular molar site . In surgical operation , 20 tissue-level 20 bone-level dental implant 12 mm length 4.8 mm diameter insert Group I Group II , respectively . Three month later , second-stage surgery perform implant exposed oral cavity . Cover screw remove replaced healing abutment . Three month wait second surgery bone level implant . Patients group enrol monthly periodontal/peri-implant maintenance program abutment connect , full mouth scale perform around natural teeth implant surface . Oral hygiene instruction regard regular tooth brush give patient encourage floss teeth periimplant surface daily . There implant fail study adverse event treatment .
DOC.criteria: patient study one tooth absent mandible patient study least 18 year old . Patients study absence follow point ; poor mouth hygiene , bruxism , dental implant , chemotherapy radiotherapy , addiction ( alcohol , cigarette , medication ) , disease jawbone observe clinically radiographically , pregnancy , antibiotic and/or antiinflammatory medication use last three month .
